titleStmt.title: Certaine fruitfull instructions and necessary doctrines meete to edify in the feare of God faithfully gathered together by Iohn Frewen ... ; whereunto is added a table, wherein the reader may easily find out the principall matters conteined in this booke.
titleStmt.author: Frewen, John, 1558-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for Thomas Chard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
